bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Test Procedures for Germanium Gamma-Ray Detectors
IEEE Standard Test Procedures for Germanium Gamma-Ray Detectors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terminology and standard test procedures for germanium radiation detectors that are used for the detection and high-resolution spectrometry of gamma rays, X rays, and charged particles that produce hole-electron pairs in the crystal lattice are established so they have the same meaning to both manufacturers and users.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
